byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Ital circles deny Greek charges of cruiser Helle sinking
snippet: ROME, Oct. 31--It is still hoped in Rome that the Greek Premier and Foreign Minister, John Metaxas, may be forced to resign and a new government formed that will prove more amenable to Italian suggestions of a diplomatic settlement....

headline.main: ITALY HOPES GREECE WILL OUST METAXAS; Awaits a Chance to Deal With a Regime More Amenable to Peace Suggestions

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 31--It is still hoped in Rome that the Greek Premier and Foreign Minister, John Metaxas, may be forced to resign and a new government formed that will prove more amenable to Italian suggestions of a diplomatic settlement.
